original_text: And Solomon awoke; and, behold, it was a dream. And he came to Jerusalem, and stood before the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and offered up burnt offerings, and offered peace offerings, and made a feast to all his servants.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 깨어 보니 꿈이더라 이에 예루살렘에 이르러 여호와의 언약궤 앞에 서서 번제와 감사의 제물을 드리고 모든 신하들을 위하여 잔치하였더라

sentences.original_text: and, behold, it was a dream
and stood before ark of the covenant of the Lord
and made a feast to all his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 종들을 위해 잔치를 베풀었다
